attributes.action: Extend Stamp Duty deadline, for those already in the house sale/purchase process
attributes.additional_details: Without this, many people will suffer financial and emotional stress
attributes.background: Extend the deadline to avoid significant financial stress, for all of those already in property purchase chains; reducing breaks in chains

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Exemption from stamp duty changes if mortgage offers predate the Autumn budget
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702150
